div.p:
The xxv dai of Jule yer' of god M iiijc lxxvij / the aldirman and consale
has consentit and grantit / that the hammyrmen of this burgh sal haue the
patronage of Sanct loyis altar in the parisch kirk of Aberdene and the
disposicione tharof in al thingis as accordis til the patronage tharof in tym tocum
apon the quhilk thai sal haue the common seil of this burgh for the mare
securite and ratificacion heirof /

In the bailye court haldin in the tolbuthe of Aberdene the xxviij dai of
the moneth of Jule yer' et cetera lxxvij / Johne stevinson oblisit him before
the balyeis sittand in Jugement / that he sal discharge and free his modir
of al clamis of dettis aght be quhilum Johne stevynson his fadir quhom
god assoilye bath on this syde the sey and beyond sey to quhatsumeuir
person or persounes / And that he sal kepe hir and hir deputis or hir
assignais quhatsumeuir thai be scaithles tharof in tym tocum To the quhilk
he oblisis him as said is his ayris executouris and assignais be al
thar landis and gudis present and for tocum

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram thoma de camera vno ballivorum die
quarta Augusti anno predicto

Quo die Robertus Dickyson manens in pettodry comparuit in curia prout fuit
premunitus ad instanciam mariorie giffard relicte quondam Johannis strabolgy pro iniusta
detencione xxiij s' ij d' ab eadem / qui quidem Robertus allegavit se soluisse dictam
summam prefato quondam Johannis strabolgy dimidium vixerat in humanis / et ad hoc
probandum Judex assignauit sibi hodie ad quindenam sinautem condempnabitur
in dicta summa

Die vija dicti mensis Augusti Willelmus quelp conuictus per assisam adiudicatus
fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Cristiane liel et emendabit
eedem prout Jura volunt

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of Aberdene before the aldirman and balye
is of that ilk the xix dai of August yer' et cetera lxxvij / the aldirman
gerd cal before him and the balleis in Jugement Anny baxtar and offerit
to minster law and iustice til hir anent the clame that scho made of
the land pertening quhilum til Johne of ruthirfurd and now til Alexander
of chavmer of murchil / allegiand that the said land is bundin til hir
be Johne of ruthirfurd for the payment of twa barellis of salmond
or x merkis of siluer falyeand tharof as the said Johnis obligacione
made til hir tharupon as scho sais proportis / quhilkis forsaidis aldirman
and balyeis askit at hir gif scho wald vndirly ane knaulage and
determinacione of ane assise of the best and worthiast persons of this burgh
apon hir said clame of the said land / and scho denyit expresly
til vndirly sic ane knaulage or determinacione of ane assise tharupon
And the said Alexander of chavmer offerit him til vndirly ane assise anent
the said annyis clame apon the said land pertening til him / quhilk scho
denyit

the same dai Johne of catnes and Johne skynnar ar oblist before the
aldirman and balyeis that gif a mychti lord george Erle of huntle pais
and contentis nocht til Alexander alanson at his next cuming to this burgh or at
michelmes next tocum xxxv s' anent Alexander dempstar for inglis clath
that thai sal pay the said sowme of xxxv s' to the said Alxr Alexander as det
touris til him tharfor at the said feist of michelmes

The sam dai Wilyam of Kyntor has grantit him dettour til Johne Wormot
of ij barrelis of salmond of termis bigane / and Johne of Kyntor his fadir
grantis that he becom burgh as said is for the said salmond / quharfor
Alexander rede ane of the balyeis chargit thaim tocontent the ij barrelis of sal
mone til John Wormot within laghful tym

Item the same dai thomas prat comperit before the aldirman balyeis and consale
as the dai assignit til him / and offerit him til vndirly law and iustice before
thaim as his Jugis ordinarez of al wrangis or iniuris done til
henry vocat as is allegit be him anent the intromitting and occupacion
of ane half nettis fisching of the pot wattir or ony vthirwais / apon
the quhilkis our soueran lordis lettres ar purchest to summond him and vthiris

Item the said dai the assise deliuerit that Anny baxtar grantit before thaim
that scho passit til lord forbes and complenyeit and purchest a lettre at him
apon Alexander of chavmer nocht cummand before / to the aldirman and balyeis to
ask law / Apon the quhilk scho was accusit / and furthwith scho grantit
that scho had offendit in faute of knaulage in the purchessing of the
said lettre bath againis the offisaris of this toune and Alexander of chavmer
And summittit hir purly and simply to the aldirman balyeis and consale
tobe correkit and tomak amendis tharfor at the sycht of thaim and at thare
wil

Eodem die thomas malisson coram Johanne Wormot vno ballivorum constituit Johannem mallisson filium
ipsius suum procuratorem ad prosequendum Ranaldum talyour de ij le pety quartaris salis et m
tabulis orientalibus prout Jura volunt Et promisit de Rato et cetera

The xxiij dai of August yer' et cetera lxxvij As tweching the lettres of our soueran
lordis and the Actis of the deliuerance of the lordis of consale schawin to the aldirman
and balleis anent the debatis and contrauersiis betuix Dauid crukeschank on the
ta part and thomas symson on the tothir part of certan tenementis and croftis within
this burgh and besyde The aldirman balleis and consale has ordanit and
chargit baith the saidis partiis tocum before the lordis and thaim the thrid
dai of our soueran lordis Justice Are next tocum / that thai may haf law
and iustice minstrit evinly to thaim eftir as it was deliuerit be the lordis
of consale
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvj die mensis Augusti predicti /

quo die Adam her
vy et Jacobus filius magistri Donaldi ipsorum quilibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem prout
compertum fuit per assisam que ordinavit ipsum Jacobum deliberandum dimidium libre cere ad
missam sancti sanguinis in partem emende
Eodem die murthacus glenmalin amerciatur pro perturbio Johannis tulidef in verbo et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvijmo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxvijmo Alexander
scrogis deuenit plegius legalis pro Willelmo sprunt de indempnitate Duncanj baxtar
aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter dictus Duncanus inuenit Willelmum blindsel seniorem
plegium legalem pro eo quod dictus Willelmus sprunt et thomas pistor erunt indemp
nes de eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo idem Willelmus blindsel plegius pro
thoma pistore predicto quod prefatus Duncanus erit illesus ut supra et cetera

Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die quinta septembris anno et cetera lxxvijo compertum fuit per assisam
quod thomas scrogis intrauit nauem Johannis vaus et iniuste spoliauit quendam seruitorem ipsius
Johannis de pannis suis / quare adiudicatur in amerciamento et restaurare pannos eidem seruitori

Eodem die andreas branche deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne vaus fratre gilberti de
indempnitate thome scrogis aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter idem thomas inuenit gilbertum vaus plegium
pro eo

Item eodem die thomas chapman deuenit plegius legalis pro thoma mar' quod dictus Johannes
vaus erit indempnis

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio ixo die mensis septembris supradicti / Dauid hil adiudicatur
in amerciamento curie pro iniusta extensione plegij super patricium Duncanson incolam de banf de
iniusta intromissione vnius barelle salmonum dicti Dauid ./ eo quod Idem patricius purgavit se
ex deliberacione assise de dicta calumpnia

the same dai the balyeis has assignit til Robert blindsele as procuratour til Johne
of ruthirfurde this day xv daies til preve the last wil and ordinance of
quhilum Androw alanson that he ordanit ane half nettis fisching of the Raik
quhilk he had of the said Johne of ruthirfurd tobe deliuerit agane to the
said Johne his assignais or procuratouris he or thai payand the sowmez that
the said androw deliuerit to the said Johne for the said wattir / and the said
androw and his executouris allowand samekil of the said sowme as thai haf
gottin proffite of the said wattir
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xjo die septembris anno et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die Dauid cruk
schank et thomas symson accusati per ballivos de perturbio adinuicem facta et de
infrictione plegiorum legalium et de felonia precogitata / que quidem actio posita fuit ad
assisam proborum virorum / qui quidam assisa deliberavit et decreuit quod dictus Dauid
et prefatus thomas ac quilibet eorum rebus erat de actionibus prenotatis et cetera conuicti
erant de eiusdem per prefatam assisam et quilibet in amerciamento curie pro perturbio Et penes
actionem regis prefatus Dauid inuenit Jacobum cumming plegium legalem ad conseruandum
prepositum et ballivos indempnes et ad comparendum crastina die coram preposito ballivis consulibus
subiture eorum ordinacionj Et eodemmodo thomas symson inuenit Robertum blindsele plegium
legalem pro eo ut supra et cetera

The xij dai of septembre yer' et cetera lxxvij / the Aldirman and consale has consentit
and ordanit / that ser Androw thomsone salbe payt yerly of his pencione of
ten merkis aught til him be this toune / be Dauid symsone of his wattir
malis / for al the tyme of the saidis ser Androwis life and Dauyis

the xiij dai of the said moneth of Septembre / Alexander sanquhar' eldar burges of abirdene
grantit before the aldirman balyeis and consale / that he aught til quhilum Dauid
blabre and his factouris fyve pundis of vsuale money of scotland atour the some'
contenit in his obligacione Tobe pait the saidis v li' til Dauid blabre sone and ayr
til quhilum the said Dauid quhom god assolye at martymes next tocum

The same dai It is deliuerit and fundin be the aldirman and the maist part of consale
that Alexander rede ane of the balyeis was ordanit and passit til malcom
mowatis wife with witnes' with him / and Ressauit hir aith with twa per
sonis with hir in forssing of hir aith thom of Kyntor and cristy fleschar'
that scho had na mare gude pertening til vmquhile Johne of mar hir
husband clamyt be Dauid mar of ayrschip / vthir than scho had gran
tit and deliuerit / and this was referrit til hir aith be the said Dauid
in presence of the aldirman and the maist part of the consale

The xv day of Septembre yer' of god M iiijc lxxvij yeris / the quhilk day
Dauid mathoson burges of this burgh and tutour til Wilyam mathosone his
brothir sone / be vertu of our soueran lord the kingis lettres of decrete has
fundin Alexander of chavmer Alexander menyes and Robert blindsel souertee and
borowis to the aldirman and balyeis be the wphalding of thare handis
that quhat landis gudis annuel rentis euidentis and chartiris that salbe
deliuerit to the said Dauid / salbe furth cumand to the proffite and avale
of the said Wilyam his brothir sone quhat tym that the said Wilyam
cumis til profite age And the said Dauid is bundin and oblist to the said
borowis be the ostencion and wphalding of his hand / that he sal free
the saidis borowis and kepe thame scaithles of the saidis landis
annuel rentis gudis charteris and euidentis in sa fer as salbe deliuerit til him as said is
and tokepe thame and ilkane of thaim scaithles tharof as law wil

ITem the same day It is ordanit and decretit be the aldirman and consale for the wphal
ding of divine seruice daily tobe made in the qweyr and kirk of Aberdene that Wilyam
yung ane of the clerkis salhaue the quartar of the galowgate til his fee for this
instant yere / And Richard boyl the quartar of the castelgate / and quhilk of the said
quartaris is bettir than vthir to be made elike to thaim be the sycht of the aldirman and consale
And Adam strath til haue the schipraw with the grene And Androw ettale the
ferd clerc salhafe the gaistraw with the scule hil

Item the sam dai Johne fichet the son of quhilum Necol fichet comperit before the
aldirman and balyeis as the day assignit til him as he allegit and offerit him redy
to ressaue ane bil the quhilk he deliuerit til patric talyour as merchand til
him of foure barellis of salmond eftir as certane arbitrouris decretit
and he couthe get na party nor deliuerence of the said bil
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxijo die septembris anno et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die Robertus Walcar
posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro iniusta lesione laurencij fowlar pro qua adiudicatur in
amerciamento curie et emendare parti lese prout Jura volunt Et in partem emende adiungitur ei
ad deliberandum dimidium marce dicto laurencio / et dimidium libre cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die prima octobris anno predicto thomas tullogh manens in leith
constituit Dauid mar suum procuratorem ad prosequendum thomas scrogis pro sex coronis
sibi ut asserit debit' pro eundem pro quinque barellis farine siliginis ipsi deliberatis
apud Dunde / et ad petendum recipiendum et optendum dictam summam prout Jura volunt
Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris procuratorij clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Memorandum quod eodem die Johannes Wode pater in presencia Johannis Wormot vnius ballivorum pro tempore
Alexandri chavmer de murchil Roberti blindsel et aliorum diuersorum / assignauit assedacionem suam
tercie partis vnius rethis de Done / Isabelle sponse sue et Andree Wode filio
suo si contingat ipsum discedere ante trium assedacionis aquarum et cetera

Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem die vjta
mensis octobris anno Domini mo iiiico lxxxvijo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Alexander de camera electus fuit in officium prepositure pro anno sequente / et
ad deseruiendum fideliter in dicto officio Juramentum prestitit corporale

Item eodem die Robertus blindsele Jacobus cumming Willelmus hay et andreas branche
electi fuerunt in officium ballivorum pro anno instante prestitis solitis iuramentis

Item eodem die Johannes de vaus' alexander chavmer philippus de Dunbrek Duncanus de
stralogh et Dauid Duncane electi ferunt in officium seriandorum prestitis solitis iuramentis

div.head: Inquisicionis nomina
div.p:
Andreas scherar' . alexander menyes Johannes . de mar . petrus Kympty Johannes de Kyntor
Dauid colison alexander howison andreas rede de badfothellis thomas de camera alexander
rede thomas prat Dauid mathoson adam de crafurd Willelmus rettre et gilbertus
morison Quj Jurati dicunt quod nesciunt si quondam macolmus berclay pater Isabelle ber
clay obiit vestitus at sasitus ut de feodo et cetera de aliquibus terris aut annuis reddi
tibus infra burgum de Aberdene ./ Et dicunt quod dicta Isabella est legittima et propinquior heres
eiusdem quondam macolmj patris sui sed non de aliquibus terris aut annuis redditibus de quibus
noticiam habent ut supra et cetera

Item eodem die subscripti electi fuerunt et iurati in communes consiliarios huius burgi pro anno instante et cetera
Andreas scherar' .
Alexander meignes .
Johannes de marr'
Johannes de Knollis
Dauid colisone
Johannes Wode
thomas de fife
thomas de camera
gilbertus Waus
Dauid mathosone
alexander de mar'.
thomas prat
Petrus Kympty
Alexander Howisone
Andreas rede de badfothellis
alexander rede
Johannes de Kyntor
Dauid symsone
Edmundus lowsone
gilbertus de camera
Adam de craufurde
Johannes stevynson
alexander hay
Dauid de Kyntor

The same dai the aldirman and consel has grantit and promittit til alexander androsone
xl s' of the common gude in contentacione for this yere because of his
removing fra the office of sergeandry in the quhilk he wes of before

The vij day of october yer' . of god M iiijc lxxvij / Alexander of chawmer aldirman
with consent and deliuerence of the hail consale na man ganestandand / has gevin
and grantit to the biging of the qweyr' ay and quhil it be fullely bigit
and complete / that thare sal be takyn of the wattir of Done fourty and
aucht pundis yerly / and of the wattir of Crois yerly twelf pundis
Alsua yerly of the procuracione of Sanct Nicolace kirk twenty
pundis quhil the forsaid qveyr be fullely bigit and complete as said is
And this is grantit and deliuerit with consent of the hail communite et cetera

Curia gilde burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per Alexandrum chavmer prepositum ballivos et confratres gilde
decimo die octobris / anno Domini et cetera lxxvijo

The same dai It is statute and ordanit be the aldirman and common consale / that gif ony burgess'
or brethir of the gilde beis made for this instant yere / that the names of the consel consen
tand to the making and ressauing of thaim be writin togiddir with thaim / or ellis that nane
be made for this yere

Item it is ordanit that na ayl salbe tappit derrer' than viij d' the gallowne that be
gude for the price

Item that na vittale be boght into the merket quhil ane houre eftir none vndir the
pain of viij s'

Item that the aldirman and a certane of the consale with him pas' thrugh the toune to see the vena
lis that ar closit / and that thai ger thaim be red and oppinnyt as thai think expe
dient and spedeful

Item that thai see al howsis vnlaghful quhare fyre is / and ger thaim be forborn
in tym tocum vndir sic painis as efferis of law

the same day / anent the third part of a serplar of wol clamyt be Johne of chavmer of
elgyne fra William rettre / the quhilk the said Wilyam allegit that he sulde haf
had fra Symon gardin that intromettit with his wol / the saidis parties beand summit
tit to the aldirman and consale for the declaracion and determinacione tharof / quhilkis aldir
man and consale has fundin the said Wilyam dettour and ordanit him to mak commpt and rekning
to the said Johne of chavmer of the said wol et cetera

Vndecimo die Octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxvijo / subscripti electi fuerunt et Jurati appreciato
res carnium pro anno instante videlicet Duncanus de byrs Johannes litstar Johannes de torryleith
Robertus bughan Walterus thomson Andreas scot Walterus quhitebrow Johannes skynnar
Johannes echtsy Johannes symson Dauid spens thomas gardner'

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
Thomas de Drum, Johannes synclere, for the evyn quartar
Johannes Kympty, Alexander huchouson, for the greyn
Andreas mare, Johannes Dyse, crukit quartar
thomas talyour, thomas palframan, futy
Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xv die octobris anno predicto

quo die Walterus rolland conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta
perturbacione Dauid howison et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt Et dictus David
et agnes sponsa sua quiti de perturbacione eiusdem Walteri et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio de Aberdene xvijo die octobris predicti / Nicholaus baxtar
accusatus per ballivos de perturbacione curie conuictus fuit per assisam et cetera amerciatur et cetera
